Detailed Description

Extended kalman filter for Ackermann vehicle.

This header contains definitions of measurement and control signal data structures, indicies of components in state/measurement/control vectors as well as the specification of the filter interface.

Author
Ossian Eriksson <ossia.nosp@m.ne@s.nosp@m.tuden.nosp@m.t.ch.nosp@m.almer.nosp@m.s.se>
